comment: @MilkStudios I wanted to be a ride or die bc the packaging was cool & the overall aesthetic of the brand was pretty chill but the products were mediocre/overpriced :( granted  I didn’t try EVERYTHING but... $50 lash serum?  $45 small tube of sunscreen? $20 half full chapstick?
